name: Pro-Tec Athletics Plantar Fasciitis Foot Sleeve - Unisex
description: Help relieve the pain and ache of plantar fasciitis with this streamlined, supportive sleeve that fits easily in your shoe.Open toe design works well under your shoe, supporting you while you train.Engineered stitching provides targeted stabilization for the arch, heel and Achilles.Compression zones add heel and arch support.Small fits men’s shoe size 5-7, women’s 5-7.Medium fits men’s shoe size 7-10.5, women’s 7-10.Large fits men’s shoe size 11-14, women’s 10-13.
